title: Never
alt: I'll never forget you--at least, the parts of you that were important red flags.
transcript:
[Cueball staring into a pond.]
Cueball: I know that no matter where I go
Cueball: or who I build a life withCueball: I will never have with anyone
Cueball: what I had with you[Cueball walks off.]
Cueball: Thank god
